name: TeTriDi
description:
Navigate a grid to place every token on a goal. The tokens move in sync with each other, so you have to take each one into consideration with what direction they will move.

There are three game modes:

  • 2 tokens/goals (Di)
  • 3 tokens/goals (Tri)
  • 4 tokens/goals (Tetra)

I highly recommend playing through Di, then Tri, then Tetra to ease through the difficulty spikes, even though all levels are accessible straight away.

Featuring
  • 60 hand made levels
  • 10 hot swappable color palettes
  • 3 hot swappable sprite sheet designs
  • Auto Save after each level completion
  • A high score records screen, how low can you go?
Controls 
  • WASD or the Arrow Keys to move
  • Spacebar to accept menu navigations
  • Escape key for pause menu
  • F key to enable/disable fullscreen

You can change the color palette at any time using the 1-0 number keys, and can swap the sprite design at any time by using the = and - keys to cycle through them.

Updates

I am working on getting this project onto Steam, everyone who purchases this game on itch is eligible for a free Steam key once the Steam version is up.  To request a Steam key just send me an email to roboticastudios@outlook.com

I also plan on adding more levels, but don't currently have a timeframe on that.
